_header: Now Christ Jesu soothfast priest and king
Subjects: prayers, to Christ; Christ, prayer to
_description: A prayer to Jesus — five stanzas rhyme royal

Longleat30.First Lines:
NOw criste iheu soþefast preest & kyngAnd for mankynde
                    mooste worthi werriour…
Longleat30.Last Lines:
…Alle þat be sory and scabbed eke with synneRather with
                    pyte þan with reddure wynneAmen

HunHM142.First Lines:
NOw criste Ihesu soþefast preest & kyngeAnd for mankynde
                    mooste worthi werriour…
HunHM142.Last Lines:
…Alle þat be sory and scabbed eke with synneRather with
                    pite þan with reddure wynne
HunHM142.Editions:
Schulz,  Herbert. C. 
             “Middle English Texts from the ‘Bement’ Manuscript.” 
             Huntington Library Quarterly
         3 (1940): 440-65: 457-8.
